reviewText:
Not bad, but having narrator Elwood Von Seibold reinact the action in Hell's Highway segment is a joke.  The man must be pushing 70
[from oneside or the other] he's fine for voice over, but director should have chosen younger man for simulated action scenes.
When Seibold jumps in jeep to rush off to next battlefield he punches it...
all the way up to about 4 miles per hour.  Information is good, but it could have been so much better.
Having old man playing soldier looks like an old man playing soldier.
